Function# sec_protocol_metadata_access_ocsp_response(_:_:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
func sec_protocol_metadata_access_ocsp_response(
    _ metadata: sec_protocol_metadata_t,
    _ handler: @escaping (dispatch_data_t) -> Void
) -> Bool
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_metadata_access_ocsp_response(_:_:)#parameters)

`metadata`A `sec_protocol_metadata_t` instance.

`handler`A block to invoke one or more times with OCSP data

## [Return Value](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_metadata_access_ocsp_response(_:_:)#return-value)

Returns true if the OSCP response was accessible, false otherwise.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_metadata_access_ocsp_response(_:_:)#discussion)

Get the OCSP response from the protocol instance peer.
